Posts.Content: Oct 2, 2014 10:12PM - edited Oct 6, 2014 08:15PM by perpetuallycurious Good evening, Ladies, Looking for a good doctor/s in the Phoenix area. A breast specialist and or a surgeon. Please and thank you.
Posts.Title: AZ referral anyone? perpetuallycurious perpetuallycurious

Posts.Content: Oct 2, 2014 10:35PM - edited Oct 6, 2014 08:28PM by perpetuallycurious Thank you! There's one; it's in Tucson. (About 5 hours RT from me) I posted the info below for future readers. Arizona Cancer Center University of Arizona Tucson, Arizona Comprehensive Cancer Center Anne E. Cress, PhD Interim Director 1515 North Campbell Avenue Tucson, Arizona 85724 Main: (520) 694-2873 Toll Free: 1-800-524-5928 Thanks much for the reply, KatheC.  (Love your icon! :0)
